description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. THIS GAME IS FOR XBOX LIVE ENABLED PROFILES ONLY!  Send a message to all of your friends or a group with only one press on a button! Communicate faster with your clan or closer friends. Use the banlist to exclude the not-so-friendly friends from receiving your message.
description.short: THIS GAME IS FOR XBOX LIVE ENABLED PROFILES ONLY!  Send a message to all of your friends or a group with only one press on a button! Communicate faster with your clan or closer friends. Use the banlist to exclude the not-so-friendly friends from receiving your message.
